about-me.title: About me
about-me.intro: Hey there, I'm Jan. I’m Jan, passionate about IT and especially enjoying the creative side of coding with HTML and SCSS, turning ideas into visually engaging and functional experiences. I enjoy leading teams, tackling challenges, and continuously learning new technologies while contributing to innovative projects.

skills.title: Core Competencies
skills.intro: I really enjoy working with HTML and CSS because it allows me to build clean, responsive layouts – and I have fun turning ideas into structures that work well across different devices. Along the way, I’ve gained valuable experience in creating user-friendly designs that improve the browsing experience.

portfolio.title: My work
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.development: In the Join project, I was responsible for coordinating the team and leading daily meetings. At the same time, I contributed equally to the programming and consistently provided helpful and solution-oriented support when challenges arose.

el-pollo-loco.description: A 2D platformer in the spirit of Super Mario, reimagined with a lively Mexican theme – from sombreros to mariachi music.
el-pollo-loco.development: As part of the Jump'n'Run project, I was solely responsible for the concept, planning, and implementation. I structured the development process, defined clear milestones, and consistently kept track of the overall progress.

headline.desktop: What my colleagues say about me

reference-01.comment: I had the great pleasure of working with Jan on the 'Join' project. Like a seasoned Product Owner, he took over communication and organization, enabling the team to complete the project ahead of time. A real asset to any team. I'd work with him again anytime!

reference-02.comment: Thank you for all your support and collaboration. Your patience and strong sense of teamwork really helped move things forward. It means a lot to have you on the team.

reference-03.comment: Jan is an excellent team player who actively contributed to the group. Clean code and empathy come naturally to him and so does having fun at work.
